nodes.text: Volpai were a four-armed sentient species found in the galaxy. Notable Volpai included Robbs Ely, Tiggs Leo, and Moregi.
Volpai were a tall and lanky species, with four arms and eyes apiece. They could have orange or blue skin.

Volpai were found on a variety of worlds throughout the galaxy, including Coruscant, Jelucan, Stobar, Pantora, and Takodana. A Volpai bartender known as Tiggs Leo was the owner and operator of Moshi Bar, a tavern located in the Coruscant Underworld. Tryphon Leo was a smuggler who once owned the Smuggler's Guide and died attempting to locate one of Maz Kanata's treasure vaults.
